name: SpellCraft (Ryan)
description:
Entry for Jamcraft 7

Source is MIT licensed at https://git.sr.ht/~rcorre/jamcraft.

This is pretty unfinished, sorry! Still, you can play around with the general concept.

WASD to move

Right click to gather resources.

Q/E to toggle your primary/secondary resource -- combine them to form new spells!

Left click to cast
